projects.name: What's your favorite movie ?
projects.description: In an application containing popular movies, you can save what you want to watch as favorites and remove them from your list after watching. Can add new movies.

projects.name: What is a Gratitude Journal?
projects.description: Write the things you're grateful for on a daily basis. If you are determined to be green or find it easier to do things digitally, this app is for you!
